featured.text: To be qualified as “extra virgin,” the oil must also pass both an official test in a laboratory and a sensory evaluation by a trained tasting panel.
What is the IOC trying to do? (A) Train more qualified olive oil tasters.

definition.zh_def: 具備必要條件或資格的
definition.en_def: Having the necessary skills, knowledge, or qualifications to do something.
definition.example: She is a qualified teacher with years of experience.
